name: Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings
description: Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings, commonly known as LabCorp, is a leading global life sciences company that provides comprehensive clinical laboratory and end-to-end drug development services. Founded in 1971 and headquartered in Burlington, North Carolina, LabCorp operates one of the largest networks of laboratories in the world, delivering a wide range of diagnostic tests and services to physicians, hospitals, and patients. The company plays a critical role in the healthcare ecosystem by offering laboratory testing services that facilitate disease diagnosis, treatment monitoring, and health management. LabCorp's extensive test menu includes routine blood tests, genetic testing, and specialized testing for various conditions, contributing to personalized medicine and improved patient outcomes. In addition to its diagnostic services, LabCorp is a leader in drug development services through its Covance division, which provides comprehensive solutions to pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies, including preclinical and clinical research, and commercialization services. LabCorp is committed to innovation and technological advancements, continuously investing in new testing methods and data analytics to enhance patient care and operational efficiency. With a mission to improve health and improve lives, LabCorp strives to empower healthcare providers and patients through accurate and timely laboratory results.

seo.meta_title: Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings | Leading Laboratory Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings (LabCorp), a leader in clinical laboratory testing and drug development services, committed to empowering healthcare through innovative solutions.

faq.question: What services does LabCorp provide?
faq.answer: LabCorp provides a wide range of diagnostic testing services and drug development services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of LabCorp?
faq.answer: Adam H. Schechter is the CEO of Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings.

faq.question: Where is LabCorp headquartered?
faq.answer: LabCorp is headquartered in Burlington, North Carolina, USA.

faq.question: What types of testing does LabCorp offer?
faq.answer: LabCorp offers blood tests, genetic testing, and specialized testing for various medical conditions.
